products.company_name: From Nature With Love - Lactobacillus Ferment
specializations: Skin care and hair care applications
product_highlights: Suitable for skin care and hair care
notes: From Nature With Love offers Lactobacillus Ferment as a water-soluble preservative suitable for skin care, hair care, and cosmetic formulations. Natural antimicrobial properties. Focus on DIY and small-scale formulation.

From Nature With Love offers Lactobacillus Ferment as a water-soluble, natural antimicrobial preservative for skin care, hair care, and cosmetic formulations. This probiotic-derived ingredient provides preservation benefits while being microbiome-friendly. Suitable for both DIY formulators and professional brands seeking natural preservation systems. The ingredient offers broad spectrum antimicrobial activity from the lactic acid bacteria family. Popular among natural and clean beauty formulators for its dual role as preservative and microbiome-supporting active.

From Nature With Love offers Lactobacillus Ferment as a water-soluble preservative with natural antimicrobial properties. Suitable for skin care, hair care, and cosmetic formulations. Focused on natural ingredients for DIY cosmetic creators.
